title: Authors and Citation
text: Markus Schemmel. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Schemmel M (2024). qpcR: R package perform calculation relative gene expression qPCR data. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {qpcR: R package to perform calculation of relative gene expression of qPCR data},   author = {Markus Schemmel},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: R package to perform calculation of relative gene expression of qPCR data
title: R package to perform calculation of relative gene expression of qPCR data
text: Calculate relative gene expression values raw qPCR data. Base R. dependencies. Detailed documentation follow soon.

title: R package to perform calculation of relative gene expression of qPCR data
code: library(devtools) devtools::install_github("mschemmel/qpcR")  # load example data qpcRdata <- read.table(system.file("extdata", "example2.tsv", package = "qpcR"), sep = "\t", head = TRUE)  # get mean relative expression qpcR(qpcRdata, hkg = "HKG", groups = "dpi")

title: R package to perform calculation of relative gene expression of qPCR data
text: minimal structure input data contain following columns: gene, treatment, cq. Primer efficiency values optional. cq contains NA, brep, trep columns needed properly exclude samples. Example datasets can found inst/extdata folder.

title: R package to perform calculation of relative gene expression of qPCR data

what: Main function to perform calculation of relative expression values of qpcr data — qpcR

title: Main function to perform calculation of relative expression values of qpcr data — qpcR
code: qpcR(   df,   hkg = NULL,   reference = NULL,   groups = NULL,   aggregate = TRUE,   outlier = TRUE,   outlier.method = "interquartile" )

title: Main function to perform calculation of relative expression values of qpcr data — qpcR
text: df data frame qpcr data hkg character vector housekeeping genes reference character vector reference sample (default = control) groups character vector conditions group aggregate boolean output aggregated groups (reference equal 1, default = TRUE) outlier boolean outlier detected removed calculation relative expression values (default = TRUE) outlier.method character string choose method remove outliers (default: interquartile)

title: Main function to perform calculation of relative expression values of qpcr data — qpcR
text: data frame relative expression values compared provided groups housekeeping genes

title: Main function to perform calculation of relative expression values of qpcr data — qpcR
code: df <- data.frame(treatment = rep(c("Control", "Infected"), 2, each = 6),                  gene = rep(c("Kinase","Actin"), 4, each = 3),                  dpi = c(rep("2dpi", 12), rep("4dpi", 12)),                  cq = sample(24)) qpcR(df, hkg = c("Actin"), groups = "dpi") #>   treatment   gene  dpi   rexpr.mean     rexpr.sd     rexpr.se rexpr.n #> 1   Control Kinase 2dpi 1.000000e+00 1.730781e+00 9.992666e-01       3 #> 3   Control Kinase 4dpi 1.000000e+00 8.458853e-01 4.883721e-01       3 #> 2  Infected Kinase 2dpi 1.637599e+04 2.836404e+04 1.637599e+04       3 #> 4  Infected Kinase 4dpi 1.256924e-07 1.987694e-07 1.147596e-07       3
